Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi took 3 wickets in the first over
Gareth Delany and Mark Adair gritted their way through a 44-run partnership
Curtis Campher and Barry McCarthy took four wickets for 10 runs in the middle overs
Shaheen Afridi hit two sixes to seal the win
Post-Match Reflections: Babar Azam remained unbeaten to take Pakistan home
Imad Wasim took care of the lower order with figures of 3 for 8 in four overs, in what is likely his last game for Pakistan
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the last game for Imad Wasim in the T20 World Cup
Others: Pakistan made it more complicated than it needed to be
Abbas Afridi swung his way through a happy-go-lucky 17
Pakistan needed 55 in 12 overs with eight wickets in hand
Shadab, to whom cricket is offering no hiding place at the moment, flicked his second ball to the wicketkeeper
